name: Taxi Racer . Crazy Cab Car Driver Simulator Games Top Free
name_original: Taxi Racer . Crazy Cab Car Driver Simulator Games Top Free
description:
◉◉ Taxi Racer ◉◉

◉◉ Crazy Cab Car Driver Simulator Games Top Free ◉◉

Get into your taxi and drive through the city at full throttle! Dodge all the cars because they want to hinder your way.

The most crazy and fearless driver will win! Do not let anyone stop you from reaching your destination.

Choose your favorite taxi from one of the four models available and carry safe to any customer!

Taxi Racer is a really fun game, with urban graphics and suitable for all ages.

Let yourself go with the speed and the adrenaline to beat other players all around the world!

Avoid collisions with other taxi cars and keep your green bar to the fullest to prevent the game does not end!

Will you dare to dominate with your taxi every corner of the city?

Features of this racing game taxis:

◉ Striking urban circuit
◉ Fantastic and enviable taxi car design
◉ Realistic and very beautiful graphics
◉ Awesome speed
◉ Score Board
◉ Appropriate action music
◉ Free racing game

Let us know if this taxi game meets your expectations. We wait for your comments or reviews!

Make your enemies know who is the king in town! Surely no one will know its secrets like you.
